creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: standing woman looking toward PR; hair in an updo with decorative sticks and bells; woman wears a tan kimono with white organic leaf-like designs; obi in front with dragon design in bold colors on black; red underskirt visible above PL foot at opening of kimono; ivory roller ends
markings: LLC, red intaglio artist seals: 乗良 {Jōryō}, 眞眞 {Shinshin}
title: Beauty with Dragon Obi
